Name: Web Deploy - Publish Website (MSDeploy)
Description: Ensures that the Web Deploy 3.5 is installed on the system. The installer is downloaded from http://www.iis.net/downloads/microsoft/web-deploy if required.

Parameters.Name: PublishUrl
Parameters.Label: Publish Url
Parameters.HelpText: Publish url to use when publishing the website.

Parameters.Name: WebsiteName
Parameters.Label: Website Name
Parameters.HelpText: Website name to use when publishing the website.

Parameters.Name: Username
Parameters.Label: Username
Parameters.HelpText: Username to use when authenticating with the HTTPS server.

Parameters.Name: Password
Parameters.HelpText: Password to use when authenticating with the HTTPS server. You should create a sensitive variable in your project variables, and then bind this value.

Parameters.Name: WebDeployPackageStepName
Parameters.Label: Package step name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of the previously-deployed package step that contains the files that you want to deploy.
